translations: 渴望；恳求（crave 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: This craving is, of course, the bane of many ex-alcoholics' existence.
sentences.translation: 这种渴望当然是许多老酒徒生活的烦恼之源。

sentences.sentence: Don't try to ignore your afternoon snack craving.
sentences.translation: 不要忽视你对午后点心的渴望。

sentences.sentence: Escaping our craving for paper will be anything but an easy affair.
sentences.translation: 摆脱我们对纸张的渴望绝非易事。
